title: Naruto
summary: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest leader, embarks on adventures to protect his village.
author: Masashi Kishimoto

title: One Piece
summary: Monkey D. Luffy sets sail with his crew in search of the ultimate treasure, the One Piece, to become Pirate King.
author: Eiichiro Oda

title: Attack on Titan
summary: Humanity fights for survival against gigantic humanoid Titans in a world where freedom is a distant dream.
author: Hajime Isayama

title: Death Note
summary: A high school student gains a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.
author: Tsugumi Ohba

title: My Hero Academia
summary: In a world where most people have superpowers called Quirks, a boy without powers dreams of becoming a hero.
author: Kohei Horikoshi

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
summary: Two brothers use alchemy to search for the Philosopherâ€™s Stone to restore their bodies after a failed experiment.
author: Hiromu Arakawa

title: Tokyo Ghoul
summary: After a deadly encounter, a college student becomes a half-ghoul and struggles to live between two worlds.
author: Sui Ishida

title: Demon Slayer
summary: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister who turned into a demon.
author: Koyoharu Gotouge

title: Bleach
summary: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper and fights evil spirits to protect the living world.
author: Tite Kubo

title: Fairy Tail
summary: A guild of powerful wizards takes on adventures and battles in a magical world.
author: Hiro Mashima
